languages.text: "Регина Зауэрбэк... пособники Кунрада продолжают вредить вашему протекторату. Боюсь, мы еще не раз услышим о {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}подобных личностях{/d}".
"Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I fear we have not heard the last of {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}such scoundrels{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Регина Зауэрбэк... пособники Кунрада продолжают вредить вашему протекторату. Боюсь, мы еще не раз услышим о {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}подобных личностях{/d}".

traits.locale_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I am afraid this was not the last we've heard of such characters."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I am afraid this was not the last we've heard of such characters."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I fear we have not heard the last of such scoundrels."

traits.locale_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I fear we have not heard the last of {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}such scoundrels{/d}."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Régina Sauerback... À l'évidence, les complices de Kunrad continuent de comploter contre votre protectorat. Je crains que nous n'ayons pas fini d'entendre parler de {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}ces scélérats{/d}. »
languages.original_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I fear we have not heard the last of {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}such scoundrels{/d}."

traits.locale_text: « Régina Sauerback... À l'évidence, les complices de Kunrad continuent de comploter contre votre protectorat. Je crains que nous n'ayons pas fini d'entendre parler de ces scélérats. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Regina Sauerback ... Offenbar intrigieren Kunrads Komplizen noch immer gegen Euer Protektorat. Ich fürchte, wir haben nicht das letzte Mal von {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}diesen Schurken{/d} gehört."
languages.original_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I fear we have not heard the last of {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}such scoundrels{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Regina Sauerback ... Offenbar intrigieren Kunrads Komplizen noch immer gegen Euer Protektorat. Ich fürchte, wir haben nicht das letzte Mal von diesen Schurken gehört.
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克……很显然，昆拉德的同党依然在密谋反对您的王朝，{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}这群乱党{/d}恐怕并没有被彻底根除。”
languages.original_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I fear we have not heard the last of {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}such scoundrels{/d}."

traits.locale_text: “蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克……很显然，昆拉德的同党依然在密谋反对您的王朝，这群乱党恐怕并没有被彻底根除。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Regina Sauerback... Está claro que los cómplices de Kunrad siguen conspirando contra su protectorado. Me temo que volveremos a tener noticias {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}suyas{/d}».
languages.original_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I fear we have not heard the last of {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}such scoundrels{/d}."

traits.locale_text: «Regina Sauerback... Está claro que los cómplices de Kunrad siguen conspirando contra su protectorado. Me temo que volveremos a tener noticias suyas».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「レジーナ・ザウアーバック…明らかに、クンラッドの共犯者らは貴君の保護領に対して陰謀を企て続けている。残念ながら、そのような{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}悪党{/d}には際限がない」
languages.original_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I fear we have not heard the last of {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}such scoundrels{/d}."

traits.locale_text: 「レジーナ・ザウアーバック…明らかに、クンラッドの共犯者らは貴君の保護領に対して陰謀を企て続けている。残念ながら、そのような{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}悪党{/d}には際限がない」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Regina Sauerback... Anlaşılan o ki Kunrad'ın yardakçıları, hâlen protektoranıza karşı bir dolaplar çeviriyor. Korkarım {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}bu adilerin{/d} kökü henüz kazınmış değil."
languages.original_text: "Regina Sauerback... Evidently, Kunrad's accomplices continue to plot against your protectorate. I fear we have not heard the last of {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}such scoundrels{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Regina Sauerback... Anlaşılan o ki Kunrad'ın yardakçıları hâlen protektoranıza karşı dolaplar çevirmekte. Korkarım {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q2_KilledRegina}bu adilerin{/d} kökü henüz kazınmış değil."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
